productSchema.description: Usage message for a Dedicated vCloud server license and support.
productSchema.attribute: The power status of the device. Usage events will not be sent for servers with a powerStatus of OFF.

attribute.name: coreStatus
attribute.allowedValues: ONLINE_COMPLETE UNDER_REPAIR REKICK MIGRATION_SERVER REACTIVATION COMPROMISED SUSPENDED_VM SUSPENDED_VM_REPLICATION

productSchema.attribute: The status of the device in CORE system. Usage events will not be sent for servers with a coreStatus not in this list of allowedValues.

attribute.name: applicationLicense
attribute.allowedValues: MBU_MS_EXCHANGE_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT_CLUSTERING MBU_MYSQL_AGENT MBU_ORACLE_AGENT MBU_MS_SHAREPOINT_AGENT MBU_CLUSTER_AGENT MBU_LBU_DEDICATED_TAPE_DRIVE MSSQL_2008_WEB MSSQL_2008_STD MSSQL_2008_ENT MSSQL_2012_WEB MSSQL_2012_STD MSSQL_2012_ENT NIMBUS_MON_LINUX NIMBUS_MON_WINDOWS SCOM_MON_WINDOWS MS_TERMINAL_SERVICES

productSchema.attribute: An application license on this server. If a server has multiple app licenses on a server, multiple usage events will be sent for those licenses.

attribute.name: support
attribute.allowedValues: WINDOWS RHEL CENTOS UBUNTU MBU_MS_EXCHANGE_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT MBU_MSSQL_AGENT_CLUSTERING MBU_MYSQL_AGENT MBU_ORACLE_AGENT MBU_MS_SHAREPOINT_AGENT MBU_CLUSTER_AGENT MBU_LBU_DEDICATED_TAPE_DRIVE MSSQL_2008_WEB MSSQL_2008_STD MSSQL_2008_ENT MSSQL_2012_WEB MSSQL_2012_STD MSSQL_2012_ENT NIMBUS_MON_LINUX NIMBUS_MON_WINDOWS SCOM_MON_WINDOWS MS_TERMINAL_SERVICES

productSchema.attribute: A guest operating system or an application that is supported on this virtual machine. If a virtual machine has more than one item in the set of software items supported, then the product must produce separate usage events for each supported software item (i.e. one event per item). For example, a virtual machine with a supported operating system and also a supported MySQL database would send two usage events: one for the operating system support, and another for the MySQL application support.
productSchema.xpathAssertion: If 'applicationLicense' attribute is specified, then 'support' attribute should not be specified.
If 'support' attribute is specified, then 'applicationLicense' attribute should not be specified.
